title: A few League Resources
body:
Hi,

I just wanted to share a few apps and links that I use to enhance my enjoyment of the game. 

Firstly you want to know who you are up against so I use - http://www.lolnexus.com/
If you want to look at stats then you could try - http://jp.op.gg/
The other source I look at mostly for the cool 3D models of all the characters is - http://www.lolking.net/

I watch the OPL. LCK, etc through these channel - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ6EyrObjc396m3MToJhblQ
                                                                                    - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvqRdlKsE5Q8mf8YXbdIJLw
I watch the OCS through this channel                    - https://www.twitch.tv/videos/169102063

I use this website to keep up to date with things - http://oce.lolesports.com/

I communicate with other players through Discord - https://discord.gg/4fYdqnU (good as a text based and VOIP tool)
I run a 1v1 tournament using Battlefy (note the OOL also use Battlefy for it's tournaments) -  https://battlefy.com/discovery/

Just a few things people may be interested in, if you have more please feel free to add sources to the list.
